title: Derivation of novel metabolic pathway score identifies alanine metabolism as a targetable influencer of TNF-alpha signaling
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Brandon N. D'Souza, Manoj Yadav, Prem Prashant Chaudhary, Grace Ratley, Max Yang Lu, Derron A. Alves, Ian A. Myles
